v1:dataset.v1:title: Mating motivation: the effect of eliminating the male function on sexual behaviour in a simultaneous hermaphrodite
v1:dataset.v1:description: The dataset contains the data used to analyse the result of the study "Mating motivation: the effect of eliminating the male function on sexual behaviour in a simultaneous hermaphrodite" by Palmeira, Nakadera and Koene, accepted for publication in Animal Behaviour in 2023.
